attributes.action: No to Rushi Sunak as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: We are tired of suffering! We want someone who understands the living situation in the present economy! Someone who would make it illegal for energy companies to refuse collecting new customers which is currently aiding in skyrocketing the energy prices! We want someone who would not increase taxes especially council taxes! Someone who understands how to guide the country successfully out of recession and not just sit and watch us plummet into recession! No free money distribution! Curb Energy
attributes.background: Let the people have their say with their vote! Boris was voted by the people but glad he has stepped down. We want to elect a new Prime minister and we do not want Rishi Sunak forced on us!

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes petitions relating to who becomes the new Prime Minister.
